text: Mi prabhuvu ksamapana vaipunaku mariyu akasam mariyu bhumi yokka vaisalyamantati visalamaina svargam vaipunaku parugettandi. Adi allah mariyu ayana pravaktalanu visvasincevari koraku sid'dha paracibadi undi. Idi allah anugraham, ayana tanu korina variki danini prasadistadu. Mariyu allah anugrahasali, sarvottamudu
